body:
You still don't get free speech on here, do you? 

This is what you do 
https://ruqqus.com/settings/blocks

And then you go back to minding your own business or fuck off back to Reddit. Ruqqus aint for you types

Contemptible does not equal site policy violation. 

But op’s fee fees are hurt by a user name, so they want to bring out the ban hammer.

But op’s fee fees are hurt by a user name, so they want to bring out the ban hammer.

author.bio:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!
author.bio_html:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

body:
Question: Would a username like this be "illegal"? (I'm guessing not but I'm not sure.) If not, is it prohibited by the TOS? If so, I'm guessing it would be considered "Sexual or sexually suggestive material involving individuals under the age of 18". What would be the reason behind making this username against the rules? Is it actually harmful to have a username like this?

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
Question: Would a username like this be "illegal"? (I'm guessing not but I'm not sure.) If not, is it prohibited by the TOS? If so, I'm guessing it would be considered "Sexual or sexually suggestive material involving individuals under the age of 18". What would be the reason behind making this username against the rules? Is it actually harmful to have a username like this?

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

author.bio: Tell the Ruqqus community a bit about yourself.
author.bio_html: Tell the Ruqqus community a bit about yourself.

body: Talking about child porn might be protected by free speech but it is too risky for the future of Ruqqus; We are not widely known yet, and if the first exposure of Ruqqus to the mass public was something related to CP, the number of new users could drop dramatically.
body_html: Talking about child porn might be protected by free speech but it is too risky for the future of Ruqqus; We are not widely known yet, and if the first exposure of Ruqqus to the mass public was something related to CP, the number of new users could drop dramatically.
